name: Tennis Slam: Global Duel Arena
description:
The World's No.1 Tennis Game - Now available on iOS!

Enter the Arena! From the creators of Ultimate Tennis comes a new strategic tennis game!

Collect and upgrade dozens of Skills and Players to defeat your opponents and win Trophies, Stars and infinite glory in the Arena. Find the best Skill that suits your Player and build a strong team against the opponent based on the player types!

Use strategies to lead your tennis team to victory!

FEATURES
● Duel players from around the world in real-time
● Earn Arena Boxes to unlock rewards, collect new Skill/Player cards and upgrade existing ones
● Construct your ultimate team deck to defeat your opponents
● Progress through multiple Arena Tiers all the way to the top
● Win against AI players, conquer the world and receive useful rewards in World Tour
● Use various Skills such as Volley, Slice, Drop, Lob, Topspin, Twist and so much more
● Dress up your players with unique uniforms and make them look like celebrity athletes

It's time to hit the court in the all-new ULTIMATE TENNIS REVOLUTION!
